mapper.select:
select rownum() rnum, * from artist
where artistName LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by artistId DESC
mapper.insert: insert into ARTIST (artistAuthor, artistName, artistBirth, agency, country, artistExplanation, createDate) values ('sony', #{artistName}, #{artistBirth}, #{agency}, #{country}, #{artistExplanation}, default);
mapper.update: update ARTIST set artistName = #{artist.artistName}, artistBirth = #{artist.artistBirth}, agency = #{artist.agency}, country = #{artist.country}, artistExplanation = #{artist.artistExplanation}, modifyDate = NOW() where artistId = #{id}
